author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: 2015 ‘Night of Joy’ at Magic Kingdom® Park
text:
Request a Quote 2015 ‘Night of Joy’ at Magic Kingdom® Park 
This September, the sounds of Christian rock, pop, and gospel will fill Magic Kingdom® Park as the 33rd annual Night of Joy takes place at the Walt Disney World® Resort. Happening after regular park hours on Fri. Sep. 11 and Sat. Sep. 12, the event will feature a mix of new and returning performers. The entertainment schedule for this year’s event is: 
Friday, September 11, 2015: 7:30p – Francesca Battistelli (Galaxy Stage) 7:40p – Jeremy Camp (Castle Forecourt Stage) 8:10p – Josh Wilson (Rockettower Plaza Stage) 8:50p – Francesca Battistelli (Galaxy Stage) 9:40p – I Am They (Rockettower Plaza Stage) 9:45p – MercyMe (Castle Forecourt Stage) 10:25p – Colton Dixon (Galaxy Stage) 11:15p – Rend Collective (Rockettower Plaza Stage) 11:55p – TobyMac (Castle Forecourt Stage) 12:05a – Big Daddy Weave (Galaxy Stage) 
Saturday, September 12, 2015: 7:30p – Jamie Grace (Galaxy Stage) 7:40p – for King & Country (Castle Forecourt Stage) 8:10p – Veridia (Rockettower Plaza Stage) 8:50p – Jamie Grace (Galaxy Stage) 9:40p – LeCrae (Castle Forecourt Stage) 9:40p – 7eventh Time Down (Rockettower Plaza Stage) 10:25p – Matt Maher (Galaxy Stage) 11:15p – 7eventh Time Down (Rockettower Plaza Stage) 11:50p – Skillet (Castle Forecourt Stage) 12a – Mandisa (Galaxy Stage) Artist lineup subject to change without notice. 
Purchase of an additional event admission ticket is required to attend. Tickets cost $65 +tax per night or $115 +tax for both nights. For additional information please contact your Magic Maker® .
